_aLatestUpdates._sText:
For some unknown reason "light_env" entity didnt work on someone's computer. This is first and hopefully last attempt to fix this issue. 
https://imgur.com/FNPXBuf

Please leave a short review of this map and its bugs.
Cheers to Krezand for notifying me about the light problem.

_aChangeLog.text: Corrected sizes of some door that had gaps.

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
Update 1.1:
I finally figured out how to make a custom radar and I got one working in this map. The radar doesn't feel perfect (due to the white color without "green screen" effect.

I also noticed that some doors, including storage gates had gaps between them and walls. This is fixed now.

_sText:
This is a Hostage Rescue map where hostages are located in THREE different areas. Terrorists are starting outside between all buildings, from where players in T side will decide where to go and what areas to cover.
Counter_terrorists stars from a bit far away area and will need to run a little before getting into hostile area. This is done to give Terrorists time to get in their positions.
